publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-102# Patricia Ferguson: 30th Anniversaries of Maryhill Housing Association and Queens Cross Housing Association—That the Parliament notes the vital contribution made in the last 30 years to the regeneration of Maryhill by both Maryhill Housing Association and Queens Cross Housing Association and congratulates both organisations on their shared anniversary; recognises the efforts of the lay members and staff of these organisations and the contribution that they have made over the last 30 years, and also recognises that, working with other stakeholders, they have ensured that housing in their areas has been greatly improved while their wider action programmes have helped to create not just good homes but safe, vibrant and confident communities.

S3M-102# Patricia Ferguson: 30th Anniversaries of Maryhill Housing Association and Queens Cross Housing Association—That the Parliament notes the vital contribution made in the last 30 years to the regeneration of Maryhill by both Maryhill Housing Association and Queens Cross Housing Association and congratulates both organisations on their shared anniversary; recognises the efforts of the lay members and staff of these organisations and the contribution that they have made over the last 30 years, and also recognises that, working with other stakeholders, they have ensured that housing in their areas has been greatly improved while their wider action programmes have helped to create not just good homes but safe, vibrant and confident communities.
S3M-102# 30th Anniversaries of Maryhill Housing Association and Queens Cross Housing Association (lodged on 30 May 2007) Hugh O’Donnell*
S3M-102# 30th Anniversaries of Maryhill Housing Association and Queens Cross Housing Association (lodged on 30 May 2007) Michael McMahon*
S3M-102# 30th Anniversaries of Maryhill Housing Association and Queens Cross Housing Association (lodged on 30 May 2007) Bob Doris*
S3M-102# 30th Anniversaries of Maryhill Housing Association and Queens Cross Housing Association (lodged on 30 May 2007) Pauline McNeill*
S3M-102# 30th Anniversaries of Maryhill Housing Association and Queens Cross Housing Association (lodged on 30 May 2007) Robert Brown*
